feature_requirements.heading: Feature Requirements
feature_requirements.content:
**Core Features (Must Have):**
- Administrative Dashboard
- Analytics & Reporting
- RESTful API
- Gamification Elements
- AI Integration
- Data Export/Import

**Enhanced Features (Should Have):**
- Advanced analytics and reporting
- Customizable user preferences
- Export/import capabilities
- Third-party integrations

**Future Features (Could Have):**
- Mobile applications
- Advanced AI capabilities
- Multi-tenant architecture
- Enterprise SSO integration

user_experience.heading: User Experience Flow
user_experience.content:
**User Journey:**
1. Initial setup and onboarding (< 5 minutes)
2. Core feature discovery and exploration
3. Regular usage patterns and workflows
4. Advanced feature adoption
5. Integration with existing tools

**Interaction Flow:**
- Dashboard-centric design with quick access to all features
- Progressive disclosure of advanced capabilities
- Context-sensitive help and guidance
- Responsive design for all device types

success_metrics.heading: Success Metrics & KPIs
success_metrics.content:
**Primary KPIs:**
- User engagement rate (target: >80% weekly active users)
- Feature adoption rate (target: >60% within 30 days)
- Task completion rate (target: >95%)
- User satisfaction score (target: >4.5/5)

**Performance Metrics:**
- Page load time (target: <2 seconds)
- System availability (target: >99.5%)
- Error rate (target: <0.1%)
